Suicide Watch Observation Log
Name of Inmate on watch: Epstein Reg #: 76318-059 Date: 07.23.19
Time Observations: Briefly note your observations. Initial all entries. Initials
8:37am Inmate Epstein is pajama'd (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:45am Inmate Epstein is sitting at the edge of his bunk motionless
* 8:59am Inmate Epstein says he feels his therapist won't let him drink water
9:00am Inmate Epstein is pajama'd looking out the window (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
9:10am is still speaking with
9:15am (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
9:30am Inmate Epstein is sitting on the edge of his bed
9:29am Inmate Epstein asked for the time
9:45am Inmate Epstein is sitting on the edge of his bed
10:00 Inmate Epstein asked to speak with his attorney Inmate Epstein is using the bathroom
10:15am Inmate Epstein is speaking with the Officer about his attorney
10:16am Inmate Epstein mentioned to b=me that (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) said his attorney is not here yet
* 10:20am Inmate Epstein is drinking water
Note to all observers: Legibly print and sign your name at the beginning of your shift.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a handwritten log. The handwriting is mostly legible, but some parts are difficult to read. There are several instances of redaction, marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C).
